template_merge_new_config.content:
telemetry
  certificate /bootflash/telegraf.crt telegraf
  destination-profile
    use-vrf management
  destination-group 101
    ip address 101.195.225.176 port 57101 protocol gRPC encoding GPB
  sensor-group 101
    data-source DME
    path sys/ch depth unbounded
  subscription 101
    dst-grp 101
    snsr-grp 101 sample-interval 10101
template_merge_new_config.name: template_101
